quote_first: I could not have committed this crime. Pauline Stacy fell from this floor to the ground at
quote_last: . A hundred people will go into the witness-box and say that I was standing out upon the balcony of my own rooms above from just before the stroke of noon to a quarter-past - the usual period of my public prayers.
title: The Eye of Apollo
author: G.K.Chesterton
